ygData.msgSnippet: yes, there is a RIGHT and LEFT side to Tasharins pages....you will need one of each...and then combine.. Fistlebane From:	Jim F  on 07/08/99
ygData.messageBody:
yes, there is a RIGHT and LEFT side to Tasharins pages....you will
need one of each...and then combine..


Fistlebane


From: Jim F <jimf@...> on 07/08/99 05:16 AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Research

First of all thanks for the replies on Rune I.
∩┐╜
I still have a question on research though.
∩┐╜
I was on baelish's EQ Enchanter site looking at the research
section, it says That for level 16 spells I need page 23 for levitate 24 for
disempower and 26 for Mesmerization.∩┐╜
∩┐╜
∩┐╜My problem is that I have had all these pages, put them in the
book(one at a time) and hit combine. I get the message those items in that
combination failed to produce anything.
∩┐╜
∩┐╜
I was then told I have to have the left and right pages, but under
the page description It says just page 23 or page 24 of Tasarins Grimoire.
∩┐╜
What am I doing wrong?
I also was not allowed to put any practices into Research.
∩┐╜
Sorry for the long winded questions but I am a bit confused about
research.
∩┐╜
Zahlhedren
Karana
